original_title: Sri Ramana Maharshi most complete explanation of SELF INQUIRY
overview: When any thought arise, do not persue it, but remain with the "feeling" of I. Do this every time the thought arise.
tagline: Sri Ramana Maharshi most complete explanation of SELF INQUIRY with David Godman and Reinhard Jung
title: Sri Ramana Maharshi most complete explanation of SELF INQUIRY
